about_the_game:
Play up to the first boss encounter of OrbWars in this demo and experience what is means to be a true OrbWarrior!
Wether you're a solo player looking for the latest roguelite to play, a friend of yours already owns the game and wants to convince you of its greatness or wether none of your friends has ever heard of OrbWars but you're always looking for a new coop game to play with them - this demo is exactly the right place to get your toes wet before taking the plunge into the full version of OrbWars.

  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 450GTS
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
